title: The Terrace
seo_title: The Terrace - NYC Rooftop Bar - WestHouse Hotel New York
seo_description: Featuring views of the Hudson River and the city, The Terrace includes two comfortable lounge areas, a dining space, and a private entertainment room.
contents:
High above the din of Gotham, on the hotel’s 23rd floor, Resident guests are spoiled with one of New York City’s most coveted outdoor spaces; The Terrace is a stylish sanctuary boasting classic views of water towers on rooftops, iconic skyscrapers of every architectural style, and the Hudson River on the horizon. Through windows and doors, natural light floods the interior space, comprised of two comfortably chic lounge areas and a shared dining area that transforms into a cocktail lounge. Here, at one of the most exclusive roof deck terraces in NYC, enjoy savory breakfast presentations and afternoon treats. Refreshing libations are on offer throughout the day , as is a complimentary barista bar inviting you to make coffees and teas to your own personal tastes.

Operation Hours:
     Weekdays: 6:30 - 10:30AM
     Weekends: 7:00 - 11:00AM
     The Terrace is accessible to guests, to hang out until 11:00PM
